nameZh: 緊急求助 (警察/消防/救護)
states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, WA, TAS, ACT
descZh: 生命受威脅、火災或犯罪進行中。如不諳英語，接通後可說「Cantonese」要求傳譯。
descEn: Life-threatening emergencies, fires or crimes in progress.

nameZh: SES 緊急救援 (水災/風暴)
states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, WA, TAS, ACT
descZh: 洪水、暴風雨、樹木倒塌等事故求助（通常屬非即時生命危險，但需要緊急協助）。如有即時危險請先致電 000。
descEn: For flood, storm damage and fallen trees. Call 000 if there is immediate danger.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 醫生收工後(晚間/週末)的上門診症服務，部分可 Bulk Bill。
descEn: Night and after-hours home doctor service.
hoursZh: 夜間／週末（以服務地區為準）

nameZh: 生命熱線（情緒及危機支援）
states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 24 小時情緒支援及危機熱線，適合感到情緒崩潰、極度壓力或有自殺念頭的人士，提供即時傾聽及支援。
descEn: 24-hour crisis support for people experiencing emotional distress, overwhelming stress, or suicidal thoughts.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 為受抑鬱、焦慮及相關心理困擾影響的人士提供 24 小時支援與資訊，亦為家人及照顧者提供建議。
descEn: 24-hour support and information for people affected by depression, anxiety, and related mental health concerns, as well as for family members and carers.

nameZh: 自殺回電服務 (專業輔導)
states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 24小時專業心理輔導，比 Lifeline 更深入。
descEn: 24/7 professional counselling service.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 政府免費電話傳譯服務，可要求廣東話。
descEn: Free government telephone interpreting service.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 被僱主剝削、欠薪或工時問題時求助。
descEn: Help with workplace rights and pay issues.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, WA, TAS, ACT
descZh: 全澳汽車道路救援入口（NRMA／RACV／RACQ／RAC 等）。撥打 13 11 11 會按你所在州份自動接駁至當地汽車會。一般需會員或保險附加服務。
descEn: National roadside assistance via state auto clubs (NRMA, RACV, RACQ, RAC, etc). Calls to 13 11 11 are routed automatically to your local state provider. Membership or insurance add-on usually required.
hoursZh: 24 小時（需會員；以服務條款為準）

descZh: 新州租客法律建議。被無理加租、拒絕維修或逼遷時求助。
descEn: Tenant rights advice in NSW, including rent increases, repairs, or eviction issues.

descZh: 維州租客法律支援，處理租務糾紛。
descEn: Tenant rights advice and support in Victoria.

descZh: 昆士蘭租客諮詢及轉介服務。
descEn: Tenant advice and referral service in Queensland.

descZh: 西澳租客法律諮詢。
descEn: Tenant and housing legal advice in Western Australia.
hoursZh: 星期一至五 9am–4pm（以官網為準）

descZh: 新州政府服務（車牌、Opal 卡、罰單）。
descEn: NSW government services (licences, Opal, fines).
hoursZh: 辦公時間（部份服務 24/7；以官網為準）

descZh: 維州政府服務（車牌、Myki 卡、登記）。
descEn: Victoria government services and enquiries.

descZh: 昆士蘭政府綜合查詢（交通、牌照）。
descEn: Queensland Government enquiries (transport, licences, services).

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 由註冊護士 24 小時接聽的醫療諮詢服務，為非緊急健康問題提供專業建議，協助判斷是否需要睇醫生、急症室或留在家中休息。
descEn: 24-hour health advice from registered nurses for non-emergency medical concerns, helping you decide whether to see a GP, go to an emergency department, or manage symptoms at home.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 舉報電話詐騙、網上情緣或投資騙案。
descEn: Report scams including phone, online dating, and investment scams.
hoursZh: 辦公時間（網站可 24/7 提交）

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 匿名舉報罪案線索，不需透露身份。
descEn: Anonymous crime reporting.
hoursZh: 24 小時 / 7 日（一般可電話／網上）

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 報案非緊急罪行（如財物被盜、車輛損毀）。
descEn: Report non-urgent incidents such as theft or property damage.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 為受家暴或性侵影響的人士提供 24 小時支援（電話／網上聊天／短訊等）。如有即時危險請致電 000。
descEn: 24/7 support for domestic, family and sexual violence (phone / online / text options). Call 000 if in immediate danger.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 查詢政府津貼及福利，此號碼為多語言專線。
descEn: Multilingual line for Centrelink payments and services.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 查詢簽證條款、永居申請或公民入籍事宜。
descEn: Visa, permanent residency, and citizenship enquiries.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 查詢 TFN、報稅或 Super 事宜。
descEn: TFN, tax return, and super enquiries.

descZh: NSW 公營精神健康服務入口。
descEn: NSW entry point to public mental health services.

descZh: 昆士蘭免費法律援助。
descEn: Free legal help and advice in Queensland.

descZh: Opal 卡、火車巴士班次查詢。
descEn: Transport info in NSW (Opal, trains, buses).
hoursZh: 辦公時間（緊急資訊以官網為準）

descZh: Myki 卡、墨爾本交通查詢。
descEn: Public transport info in Victoria (Myki, services).

descZh: Go Card、布里斯本交通查詢。

descZh: SmartRider、珀斯交通查詢。
descEn: Public transport info in Western Australia (SmartRider, services).

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 澳洲紅十字會為臨時簽證人士、尋求庇護者及簽證狀態未明的人士，提供緊急援助，包括食物、藥物或臨時住宿等基本生活需要。
descEn: Emergency relief provided by the Australian Red Cross to support people on temporary visas, seeking asylum, or with uncertain visa status, including help with food, medicine, and short-term accommodation.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: Ask Izzy 提供全澳各地的社區支援資訊搜尋，包括食物援助、經濟支援、住屋、家暴支援、心理輔導等服務，適合需要即時尋找本地資源的人士使用。
descEn: Ask Izzy helps you find local support services across Australia, including food assistance, financial help, housing support, family violence services, and counselling.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 為 5–25 歲兒童及青少年提供 24 小時免費及保密的電話輔導，涵蓋情緒、家庭、學校、人際關係等問題。
descEn: 24-hour free and confidential counselling for children and young people aged 5–25, covering emotional wellbeing, family, school, and relationship issues.

descZh: 為新州移民及臨時簽證人士提供免費法律建議，重點處理移民身份及權益問題。電話諮詢時間為星期二及四，下午 2–4 時。
descEn: Free immigration legal advice for migrants and temporary visa holders in NSW. Phone advice available Tuesday and Thursday, 2pm–4pm.

descZh: 新州法律援助機構，提供法律援助服務及合資格人士的法律代表／支援；如只需要免費法律資訊及初步意見，請致電 LawAccess NSW（1300 888 529）。
descEn: NSW legal aid service. For free legal information/initial advice and referral, call LawAccess NSW (1300 888 529).

descZh: 首都領地法律援助服務，提供免費法律意見及支援。電話服務時間為星期一至五，上午 9 時至下午 5 時。
descEn: Legal aid service for the ACT providing free legal advice and assistance. Phone service Monday–Friday, 9am–5pm.

nameZh: 難民支援中心法律服務 (ASRC)
descZh: 為尋求庇護者提供法律初步評估及轉介服務，協助處理移民及難民相關法律問題。
descEn: Legal triage and referral services for people seeking asylum in Victoria.

nameEn: Southern Communities Advocacy Legal Education Service (SCALES)
descZh: 西澳南部社區法律中心，為當地居民提供免費法律諮詢及支援服務。
descEn: Community legal centre providing free legal advice and support in southern Western Australia.

descZh: 為經濟困難人士轉介免費或義務法律服務，包括移民相關案件。
descEn: Connects people in financial hardship with free or pro bono legal assistance, including migration matters.

descZh: 為北領地移民及多元文化社群提供支援及轉介，包括法律相關服務。
descEn: Support and referral services for migrants and multicultural communities in the Northern Territory, including legal support.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
descZh: 提供 24 小時中毒相關專業建議，包括誤食藥物、化學品、植物、清潔用品或被昆蟲／動物咬傷。如情況危急，仍應即時致電 000。
descEn: 24-hour expert advice for poisoning, including medicines, chemicals, plants, household products, or bites and stings. Call 000 if the situation is life-threatening.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT

descEn: Support and information for people with asthma and their carers, including symptom management, medication use, and asthma action plans.

states: NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, NT, TAS, WA, ACT
